full_text:
Page 2540

Fwd: MCC Visit Thursday
From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
To 
Date 2019/08/13 16:24
Subject: Fwd: MCC Visit Thursday
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Please ensure your area is presentable and all cells are clean.

Thank you

>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8/13/2019 3:28 PM >>>
Warden,

Per our discussion, please see the below request for a tour of the SHU and suicide watch areas by the US Attorney and his staff Thursday, August 15. I will try to arrange it for 10 am, but we may be subject to the US Attorney's schedule. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
f: (646)836-7665

>>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 8/13/2019 2:05 PM >>>
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

The list of visitors from our office is below:

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

As discussed, we would like to see the 2nd floor psych observation and suicide watch area; the 9th floor SHU, and Epstein's cell, which we understand to still be cordoned off. As discussed, we would appreciate if only MCC legal would escort us, and we will not speak to any of the guards present given the ongoing investigations. Please give me a call with any questions, and let us know what time and where we should go and if it would be easier for us to enter via the 3rd floor bridge
Page 15868
DOJ-OGR-00026200

Warden,

Per our discussion, please see the below request for a tour of the SHU and suicide watch areas by the US Attorney and his staff Thursday, August 15. I will try to arrange it for 10 am, but we may be subject to the US Attorney's schedule. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

As discussed, we would like to see the 2nd floor psych observation and suicide watch area; the 9th floor SHU, and Epstein's cell, which we understand to still be cordoned off. As discussed, we would appreciate if only MCC legal would escort us, and we will not speak to any of the guards present given the ongoing investigations. Please give me a call with any questions, and let us know what time and where we should go and if it would be easier for us to enter via the 3rd floor bridge

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions of personal information marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C). The email discusses a visit to the Metropolitan Correctional Center and requests a tour of certain areas.
